name: Go Rally
summary: With loads of tracks, cars, a career mode, multiplayer time challenges and an awesome track creator, Go Rally is the only rally game you'll ever need! Draw a line on your screen, tap the 'race' icon, and instantly drive your very own track! Add hills, bridges, checkpoints, trackside banners, houses and terrain - create the circuit of your dreams, then share on-line and challenge your friends, and the world, to beat your times.
